mapper.select: select 1 as level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from tbl_goodscategory where cateCodeRef is null union all select 2 as level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from tbl_goodscategory where cateCodeRef is not null order by cateCode
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_goods (gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg) values (#{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes}, #{gdsImg}, #{gdsThumbImg})
mapper.select: select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join tbl_goodscategory c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join tbl_goodscategory c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_goods set gdsName = #{gdsName}, cateCode = #{cateCode}, gdsPrice = #{gdsPrice}, gdsStock = #{gdsStock}, gdsDes = #{gdsDes}, gdsImg = #{gdsImg}, gdsThumbImg = #{gdsThumbImg} where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
